## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [ ] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [ ] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [ ] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Insults, spread rumors;
- [ ] Damage to the reputation of others;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons  share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances  pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

Block bad website sharecuts.cn

### Enter the issue address

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151551

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Your comment

https://sharecuts.cn/post/4344

There are insults, spread rumors, damage to the reputation of others,
and a large number of other bad content on this website.See the issue.

I sincerely hope that the Adguard team will support justice and approve and merge this PR to protect the rights of users.

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![IMG_0151](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/85857425/8a016d09-a0d5-4eae-a9d4-a702778b17d3)

</details>

### Terms

issue.body: ### Prerequisites - [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [X] Browser version is up-to-date; - [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard for Windows ### AdGuard version 7.13 ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? Firefox, Chrome ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://www.editions-eni.fr/ ### What filters do you have enabled? AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard French filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, Fanboy's Annoyances, Fanboy's Social Blocking List, Web Annoyances Ultralist, Adblock Warning Removal List, Fanboy's Enhanced Tracking List, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List, NoCoin Filter List ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. When AdGuard is enabled, every page you visit on this web site pops up an error message: https://www.editions-eni.fr Disabling AdGuard and refreshing the page gets rid of the error message. 3. Screenshots ### Privacy - [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Hello @AdSlayer, thank you very much for your help.
The issue is caused by the rule `||editions-eni.fr/dlg/cookies.aspx` from Fanboy's Annoyances, please add to user rules:

```
@@||editions-eni.fr/dlg/cookies.aspx
editions-eni.fr###CkC
```

I informed the developer of Fanboy's Annoyances about this error.
